summary:
This Mod makes the Riverwood Forge a better looking and more useable place by adding a Smelter and lots of small details.
Thus not killing you're Immersion or Performance, this mod changes the feel of Riverwood whilst remaning compatibility and sticking to the Lore.
This Plugin is cleaned with TES5-Edit.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=5]Riverwood Forge enrichment
[/size][/b][/u]
This Mod makes the Riverwood Forge a better looking and more useable place by adding a Smelter and lots of small details.
Thus not killing you're Immersion or Performance, this mod changes the feel of Riverwood whilst remaning compatibility and sticking to the Lore.
This Plugin is cleaned with TES5-Edit.

Please note this is one of my first Mods ever and it is not perfect in any way, i still have much to learn about the Creation Kit and making Mods
for Skyrim in general but i allways have an open ear for feedback and suggestions.

[u][i][font=Courier New][size=4]Version history/ Changelog[/size][/font][/i][/u]

[i][u]1.0 First release.
1.1 (Not released yet) Multiple lightning fixes.
[/u][/i]
[size=4]Super special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140928]izon87604[/url] for a superb showcase of my mod.
[/size]
Take a small look at my newest mod which adds a simple but nice forge to the city of Winterhold: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67801/?][i][u]
[/u][/i][/url][i][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67801/?]A small forge addon for Winterhold
[/url][/u][/i]
author: Plinax aka MigthyMagnus
